name: Qorgeth
description: A gargantuan fiend with robust natural armor, Qorgeth embodies chaos and evil, enhancing its formidable presence in battle.
memorable: Qorgeth's ability to swallow creatures and manipulate the battlefield with burrowing and spells makes it a uniquely terrifying foe.
goals: To dominate opponents in battle, utilizing physical attacks and spellcasting.
relations: Might be encountered alongside other fiends or manipulative creatures that leverage chaos.
environment: Typically found in areas of great destruction or chaos, often haunting subterranean lairs.
strengths: Damage immunities to multiple weapon types, exceptional offensive capabilities, and battlefield manipulation through burrowing.
weaknesses: Notably low Dexterity hampers its ability to evade attacks.
attacks: Multiattack consisting of powerful Bite, Crush, and Stinger attacks, each with significant damage potential.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to swallow enemies, leading to blinding, restraining effects and necrotic damage.
senses: Possesses blindsight and tremorsense both extending 120 feet, allowing it to detect creatures without vision.
skills: Highly perceptive with a +13 modifier in Perception, making it adept at noticing threats.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
Three uses of Legendary Resistance daily enhance its durability against spells.
Magic Resistance gives advantage on saving throws against magical effects.
Can create 15-foot-diameter tunnels by burrowing through solid rock.
Can cast a variety of potent spells, including earthquake once per day.
spellcasting: Can cast at will black tentacles and detect magic; dispel magic and insect plague thrice daily; and earthquake and teleport once per day.
test_queries: chaotic evil monster that swallows enemies
fiend with strong physical attacks and spells
